{% extends "_layouts/skeleton.html" %} {% set content %} # Custom routes Pronotype lets you specify custom routes for serving up pages. These should be defined in a `routes.yml` file that lives in your site's `config` directory - i.e. at `/path/to/site/config/routes.yml`. Unlike [configuration files]({{ pt.pages.getUrlById('config') }}), you cannot define 'global' routes for all your sites, and nor can you define per-environment routes. Full details of how to specify custom routes for your site can be found in the [pages and URLs section]({{ pt.pages.getUrlById('pages-custom-routes') }}). {% endset %}
